A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not going to say that this movie was bad\, just that it didn't meet my expectations as far as the plot and story.  I didn't care for the manner of Luke's death\, and I didn't like his attitude for most of the film.  I also expected more from the Snoke character.\nAgain\, this wasn't a bad movie\, it just could have been a lot better.
